column1: # Report suite: ING Direct Production Report Suite
# The conversion rate of online home loan applications starts divided by the number of home loan product page views
# This shows the number of ONLINE mortgage applications.
# This number won't match up with the number of direct  channel applications as direct includes online and contact centre.
# Report suite: ING Direct Production Report Suite
# To turn anything into a line chart to track progress,
# This reports on the product pages inside the mobile app
# Report suite: ING Direct Production Report Suite
# app = mobile app product page (not UNICA banner)
# App start rate from key visitor site pages
# Report suite: ING Direct Production Report Suite
# This tracks the % of visits that arrive on a particular page and then hit the home loan app start form.
# This is a good metric to measure the effectiveness of a particular page in starting a home loan
# Same-session conversion rates | Apply funnel (from app start to app complete)
# Report suite: ING Direct Production Report Suite
